video.title: Machine Learning on JavaScript
video.description:
In this talk you will learn different machine learning algorithms using JavaScript and NodeJS, finally diving into neural networks using SynapticJS.

Talk given by Lucas Aragno at Node Summit 2017.

Thanks to Node Summit for giving us permission to post this talk. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Antonio Fuller
topLevelComment.text: Tensorflow library has far more functions than this. Sad

topLevelComment.author: sol0matrix
topLevelComment.text: Why not use tensorflow instead of this library?

topLevelComment.author: Nazar M
topLevelComment.text: A little hard to understand. I suggest reading from a manuscript so its easier to follow, and the video will also be shorter/more concise.

replies.author: Alston C
replies.text: Click on the CC button in the lower-right corner of the video and you can activate the CC transcript in the video.
